column1: The main components of our sales and marketing expenses are:

•
compensation expenses for employees engaged in sales and marketing sales support and certain customer

•
spending relating to our advertising and promotional activities in support of our products and services.
The main components of our general and administrative expenses are:

•
compensation expenses for employees in finance human resources information technology legal and other

•
expenses relating to legal matters including fines and settlements; and

•
third-party  services 
fees 
including  audit  consulting  outside 
legal  and  other  outsourced  administrative
